"@Artcast Nyans":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5392919a636872220b160100#post_5392919a636872220b160100
If I was high, I would say a mini Twilight came through riding a leaf like a plane, assault me with a tiny gun and throw mini nukes all over the place. Then, she would return through the portal and with a flash, everything is fixed as if it never happened.

So yeah, I guess I'm not that high.

topics.body: Wisconsin just struck down their gay marriage ban.  I believe there's 18 states where it's legal, 7 where it's struck down and going to appeals court and the rest are still waiting on their court dates.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

"@Artcast Nyans":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5392947b6368722294510200#post_5392947b6368722294510200


well in our country its illegal because its incostitutional, since the law says its a contract between a man and a woman.

It's just... asjhdfgiahusoif;jhagerfwoisd;klfndfv-- I can only _barely_ contain myself from my sheer utter satisfaction of how epic and hilarious and thrilling and interesting that movie was.
